caption: Relating to the determination of resident status of students by public institutions of higher education.
summary: This bill modifies Texas education code regarding resident status determination for higher education. It removes provisions allowing undocumented students who graduated from Texas high schools to qualify for in-state tuition. Chinese students without proper federal authorization to be in the US will be classified as non-residents and must pay higher out-of-state tuition rates, even if they previously qualified as residents.
translation: 该法案修改了德克萨斯州教育法规中关于高等教育居民身份认定的规定。法案删除了允许在德州高中毕业的无证学生享受州内学费的条款。没有合法联邦居留许可的中国学生将被归类为非居民，必须支付更高的州外学费，即使他们之前符合居民资格。
committees:
